summary: This Mod adds 3 new Companions with unique Perks to Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=+3]This Mod adds 3 Companions with unique Perks to Whiterun:[/center][/size]

[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/mlkobt.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[color=blue][Update 1.3][/color]
   -tested with Dawnguard for compatibility issues 
   -added unique Perks to Lynn, Shavir and Ayumi
   -removed *.BSA files

[color=blue][Update 1.2][/color]
  -added 3rd Companion

Lynn + Shavir:
   -fixed issues with face color not matching bodies

[color=blue][Update 1.1][/color]

Lynn:
   -minor perk & combat style changes (should use bow more often now)
   -added *.BSA file with meshes & textures for (nearly) same appearance as in the pictures without any mod requirements
   -minor cosmetic changes to Lynn
Shavir:
   -added *.BSA file with meshes & textures for (nearly) same appearance as in the pictures without any mod requirements
   -minor perk & combat style changes 

[color=red][Description:][/color]

[b]Lynn[/b] (Archer/Light Armor):
Location : The Bannered Mare
[color=red]Unique Perks:[/color] 20% increased bow damage against undead, 20% damage reduction against undead when wearing light armor
Mods Required: none - includes all meshes & textures needed for (almost) same appearance as in the pictures

[b]Shavir[/b] (2H Warrior/Heavy Armor):
Location: Warmaiden\'s
[color=red]Unique Perks:[/color] 20% fire resistance, 20% increased damage against dragons with 2H weapons
Mods Required: none

[b]Ayumi[/b] (1H Warrior/Dual Wield):
Location : The Bannered Mare
[color=red]Unique Perks:[/color] 30% chance to dodge attacks while wearing no armor, 10% increased damage when dual wielding 1H swords
Mods Required: none -  includes all meshes & textures needed for (almost) same appearance as in the pictures


[color=red][b]Recommended Mods (for same appearance):[/b][/color]

Lynn:
Armor in Picture: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5642]Improved Eisen Armor - Purchasable - Craftable - Improvable[/url]

Ayumi:
Clothes & Weapon in Picture: 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15389http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15389]Insanitys Celtic Katana[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14642]Neo Oriental Dress v1_20 CBBE UNP[/url]

Shavir:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941]Coverkhajiits[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784]High Resolution Scars by Xenius[/url]

Armor & Weapon in Picture:
Dread Knight Greatsword from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15494]Dread Knight Weapon Set[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12693]Einherjar Armor[/url]
Cloak from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks[/url]

all pictures were taken with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22506]Beautiful Skyrim - Unreal Cinema - ENB by Unreal Warfare[/url]

[color=red][Known Issues:][/color]

   -cell names of Bannered Mare & Warmaiden\'s may change to german (fix in progress)
  
[color=red][Credits to:][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face by tktk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249]Improved Eyes Skyrim by missjennabee[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6192]JazzJR CoverKhajiits Bodytexture Ver1 by JazzJR[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589]Natural Eyes by nevenbridge[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11173]numenume Hair by numenume[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7897]envision Face by DD AKT[/url]

if i forgot anyone, feel free to contact me !
author: Abbath99

files.name: Lynn
files.changelogHtml:
minor perk & combat style changes to Lynn (should use bow more often now)
removed requirement for ApachiiSkyHair
added meshes & textures for standalone version (no other mods required for appearance)
minor cosmetic changes to Lynn
minor perk & combat style changes to Shavir
added meshes & textures for Shavir standalone version (no other mods required for appearance)
